pre_caption:
This is a stunning night-time shot of the Place Vendôme in Paris, with the iconic Vendôme Column as the central focus. The column is dramatically illuminated with a cool, greenish-blue light, standing in contrast to the warm, golden glow from the windows of the elegant surrounding buildings. Ornate street lamps cast bright, starburst-like light across the square.

The camera performs a slow, upward tilting motion, gradually emphasizing the height and grandeur of the monument against the dark night sky.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
